Text:
Oh you awesome guy, you.
My thanks are sincere, and numerous too.
Now I gotta go make love to this trilogy.
I should grab some more books, and have an orgy.

A poem, just for you. I was trying to find a word that rhymes with "trilogy" other than "orgy," but no such luck.
lol that's great, have fun with that orgy of yours...and I'll be sure to get a rhyming dictionary for you!
